description.short: Fullstack Web Develper | Guitar Player | Environmental Engineer
long: I am currently working as a Fullstack Web Developer for SEGIM, a SaaS solution that makes it easier for real estate agencies to manage their portfolios and prospect new customers.
During the night I work as a freelancer for a digital agency making custom CMSs and institutional websites with PHP/Laravel, and for another company maintaining a social network for coaches/montors.
I used to play guitar and sing for two heavy/thrash metal bands.
I lived in the U.S. during 2014/2015 as an exchange student at the University of Vermont and now ice hockey is my favorite sport.

Although my formal education is environmental engineering, I fell in love with programming and decided to start as web developer, but I love the entire application life cycle and even the business side of things.

favorite.book_series: A Song of Ice and Fire
